targets.query: SELECT mean("wind_chill") * 9/5 + 32 FROM "weatherflow_obs" WHERE ("collector_type" =~ /^$collector_type$/ AND "station_name" =~ /^$station_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("wind_chill") * 9/5 + 32 FROM "weatherflow_obs" WHERE ("collector_type" =~ /^$collector_type$/ AND "station_name" =~ /^$station_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("wind_chill") * 9/5 + 32 FROM "weatherflow_obs" WHERE ("collector_type" =~ /^$collector_type$/ AND "station_name" =~ /^$station_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("lightning_strike_count") FROM "weatherflow_obs" WHERE ("station_name" =~ /^$station_name$/ AND "collector_type" =~ /^$collector_type$/) AND lightning_strike_last_distance <= 42 AND lightning_strike_last_distance >= 1 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) fill(null)

SELECT distinct("distance") * 0.62137 FROM "weatherflow_evt_strike" WHERE ("station_name" =~ /^$station_name$/ AND "collector_type" =~ /^$collector_type$/ AND "device_name" =~ /^$device_name$/) AND distance <= 42 AND distance >= 1 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "device_name" WHERE "station_name" =~ /^$station_name$/
list.label: Device
list.name: device_name
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "device_name" WHERE "station_name" =~ /^$station_name$/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "station_time_zone" WHERE "station_name" =~ /^$station_name$/
